channel.title: Brody Stevens Festival Of Sports
channel.itunes:summary: Brody Stevens is here to talk sports, apple cider vinegar, positive push, being from the valley, and comedy. Yes! Enjoy it!
channel.itunes:author: Brody Stevens
channel.description: Brody Stevens is here to talk sports, apple cider vinegar, positive push, being from the valley, and comedy. Yes! Enjoy it!

item.title: Episode 21 - Jon Reep
item.description: Brody is joined by fellow All Things Comedy podcaster and comedian Jon Reep of Fried to talk about respect, Carolina Panthers, "Metro" Jethro, apple cider vinegar, Braves, Jason Bateman, and we play The Baseball Card Game. Enjoy it!

item.title: Episode 20 - "The Frank Robinson"

item.title: Episode 14 - Nadya Ginsberg
item.description: Brody is joined by old friend and performer Nadya Ginsberg to talk about witnessing a crime, New York comedy, reality shows, monoculture, the sports community, and we play the Baseball Card Game. Enjoy it!

item.title: Episode 12 - Live from ATC Comedy Festival w/ Al Madrigal & Sean Conroy
item.description: Brody is live in Phoenix, AZ from the 1st ever All Things Comedy Comedy Festival with ATC founder Al Madrigal & Sean Conroy of the Long Shot Podcast. Enjoy it!

item.title: Episode 11 - Ronnie Gonzalez
item.description: Brody is joined by Ronnie Gonzalez (Jeff Richards) to talk about Seattle, jiu-jitsu, chili, meditation, Keith Morrison, and Louie Anderson. Enjoy it!

item.title: Episode 10 - Tornado Of Tension
item.description: Brody talks about the NFL protests, Sports Chalet, Eminem, Yu Darvish, Best Damn Sports Show, stretching, and The Ultimate Secrets To Total Self-Confidence. Enjoy it!

item.title: Episode 9 - "The Willie Stargell"
item.description: Brody memorializes his friend Frank, impressively names all of the World Series matchups from 1977-present, and we play the Baseball Card Game. Enjoy it!

item.title: Episode 5 - Yoshi Obayashi
item.description: Brody is joined by comedian Yoshi Obayashi to talk about colon health, baseball in The Netherlands, the NBA, coaches biographies, St. Louis (producer Aaron approves), and touring the world. Enjoy it!

item.title: Episode 4 - Benji Aflalo
item.description: Comedian, writer, and actor Benji Aflalo (Alone Together) joins Brody to discuss growing on the road, The Dodgers, self-assessment, and we play The Baseball Card Game. Enjoy it!

item.title: Episode 3 - Sandy Danto
item.description: Comedian Sandy Danto joins Brody to discuss Vitamin Water, the Detroit Tigers, appearing taller, following a strong comic, and sitting next to an overzealous owner. The Baseball Card Game is born! Enjoy it!
